resources.string: You will be receiving Push Notification based on your settings. If you don\'t want it, you can go to settings to unsubscribe
Android version \'4.4\', \'4.4.1\' and \'4.4.2\' has a bug so that you cannot post on the board with attaching files. \nDo you want to proceed anyway? \n(Otherwise, use Chrome app)
